title: Cooper Union
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922055506/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922055506/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : Cooper Union**

The Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art  
 [http://www.cooper.edu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922055506/http:/www.cooper.edu/)

A university-level accredited school for Art and Architecture in New York City. Considered one of the best art schools in the world, all Cooper Unions students pay no tuition; they are all on full scholarship! (the scholarship does not normally include room or board)

The Cooper Union [Herb Lubalin Study Center for Design and Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922055506/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Herb%20Lubalin%20Study%20Center%20for%20Design%20and%20Typography)  
 [http://www.cooper.edu/art/lubalin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922055506/http:/www.cooper.edu/art/lubalin/)

An excellent resource for type history at the Cooper Union.

[James Craig](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922055506/http:/typophile.com/wiki/James%20Craig) is a professor for typography at the Cooper Union.
author: filip blazek
